AssessmentStagedData.name: AssessmentStagedData
AssessmentStagedData.description: Represents the responses to assessment questions when a user captures and submits information with the Discovery Framework Data Capture Flow on a mobile device. The information is used to create assessment and related records.

DynamicDataCaptureId.description: The Dynamic Data Capture associated with the assessment staged data.

Name.description: Auto-assigned number that identifies the assessment staged data record.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns the record.

ParentId.description: The parent associated with the assessment staged data record.

Response.description: The response to assessment questions as submitted by users, in JSON format.

ResponseProcessingError.description: The error encountered while processing the question responses for creating assessment and related records.

ResponseProcessingStatus.description: Specifies the status of the processing of question responses, and the creation of the assessment and its related records.
